_description: Gospel for Whitsunday, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Þis day Witsonday Is caldffor wit and wisdam seuen
                    fold…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor Boxumnes is vre gospelleA tale þer of I wol ow
                    telle
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Si quis diligit me sermonem meum (f. 192rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þis daie wittsondaie es calldeffor witte & wisdome seuene
                    falde…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor bowsomnes es in oure spellA tale þareof i will
                    ȝou tell
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoetc3.First Lines:
I do als my fadir bad meAls swa say swa be ho[
                    ]…
BodEngPoetc3.Last Lines:
…And for buxomnes es in our go[ ]A tale þer of will I
                    ȝhow telle

BodLatMisB17.First Lines:
…And fyndys in me nokyn folyBot þat þis warld wele
                    wett þat i…
BodLatMisB17.Last Lines:
…ffor berriþ [ ]re godpellA tayl þare of I wyll
                    ȝou tell
BodLatMisB17.Note:
Corresponds to Oxford,  Bodleian Library Ashmole 42 (SC 6923), fol. 132-132v;
                    imperfect at beginning because just fragment; 20½ couplets.
BodLatMisB17.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  S. 
             “A Note on the Robartes MS of the Northern Homily Collection.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         67 (1966): 58-66: 58-66.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þis day Witsononday es caldeffor wit and wisdevne seuen
                    falde…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ffor buxomnes es in oure godspelleA tale þere of wille I
                    ȝowe telle

CULDd11.First Lines:
This day witsonday is caldfor wisdom & wit seuene
                    fald…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…for buxomnes is in oure Gospellea tale þer of I wile
                    ȝow telle
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
In die Pentecostes Euangelium secundum Iohannem Cao 14 Si
                        quis diligit me sermonem meum seruabit Et pater meus diliget eum &
                        cetera (f. 132v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Þis day wytte sononday es caldeffor wytte and wysdome seuen
                    falde…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…ffor bonesomnes es in oure gospellA tale þare of wyll I
                    ȝow tell

BLHar4196.First Lines: Witsunday þis day es caldffor wit and wisdom seuyn fald…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Als cumandes crist in oure godspellA tale þarby I will ȝow tell
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Si quis diligit me & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In die pentecosten Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 95rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.223-227.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
…In my name shall my fadir it sendeAnd in ȝow shall his
                    wysdome lende…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor bowsommes is oure spellA tale þer of I will
                    þow tell

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þis day Wyt sunday is callydffor Wyt and wysdome
                    sondyrfald…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor buxumnys is in oure gospellAnd a tale þare off I
                    will ȝow tell

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Thys day of whissonday es caldfor wyll & wysdom seuen
                    fald…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…And for buxsomnes es in oure gospella tale þere of I
                    wyll ȝow tell
